Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Add an InheritanceDemand for the same permissions (as the LinkDemand) or seal the class.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("The type isn't sealed and has a LinkDemand. It should also have an InheritanceDemand for the same permissions.")

Docs.summary: The rule checks for types that are not sealed and that have a LinkDemand. In this case the type should also have an InheritanceDemand for the same permissions. An alternative fix is to seal the type.
Docs.remarks: Before Gendarme 2.2 this rule was part of Gendarme.Rules.Security and named TypeLinkDemandRule.
